INTRO_TEXT: Hello, I am a Frontend Developer from Ettenheim, Germany. I have successfully developed several responsive web applications and business apps. I had the privilege to work with professional programmers, which took my personal and professional growth to a new level. If you are interested in using my experience to benefit your team, please do not hesitate to contact me.
FACT_1: Away from the screen, I find my greatest joy in spending time with my family. Whether it's exploring nature together or simply enjoying a simple evening at home, these moments are sacred to me.
FACT_2: Furthermore, I am interested in continuously expanding my horizons and plan to extend my skills to a full-stack development in my free time.
I've acquired expertise in developing pr: I've acquired expertise in developing projects utilizing diverse frontend technologies and concepts.
This page is a sample of my work - pleas: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
JOIN_DESC: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
POLLOLOCO_DESC: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
DABubble_DESC: A chat messenger based on Slack, including file sharing and authentication/registration.
SIMPLECRM_DESC: Simple CRM system for creating customer data and storing it on a cloud-based database. A News API keeps you up-to-date with the latest technologies.
